name: 75 Hard Tracking Template
description: Considered one of the toughest challenges to complete, the 75 Hard challenge was developed by entrepreneur Andy Frisella in order to address the lack of mental toughness and discipline in his life. If you decide to take on this challenge, this Notion template is the tool to help you keep track of your progress, keep you motivated, and make completing these daily habits for 75 days that much easier.What is this challenge for?In his own words, Andy says:"I spent the last 20 years figuring out how
features: Choose a diet and follow it; Complete two 45-minute workouts daily; Drink a gallon of water every day; Read 10 pages of nonfiction; Take progress pictures; Habit trackers for each of the 5 rules; Visual calendar of the days you've completed; Space to include your progress photo; A calendar view that shows your progress photos to visually track how you are changing; Motivation board for those hard days
